Summary: LOOK LIKE A GLOWING OBJECT COMEING ACROSS THE SKY AND STOP PED AND HOOVERED
divs: Sighting Details I WAS SITTING ON MY PORCH LATE EVENING AND SAW THIS OBJECT COMING FROM THE EAST TOWARD OUR DIRECTION. THE CLOSER IT GOT TO US THE BIGGER IT GOT LOOKED LIKE A LIGHT COMING IN A STRAIGHT LINE ACROSS THE SKY. IT GOT TO CERTAIN SPOT AND STOPPED HAD A RED GLOWING APPEARANCE FOR ABOUT A COUPLE MINS. THEN DISSAPEARED.
